summary: Sinbad and the vizier of Marabia, followed by evil magician Koura, seek the three golden tablets that can gain them access to the ancient temple of the Oracle of All Knowledge.
cast: John Phillip Law|Caroline Munro|Tom Baker|Douglas Wilmer|Martin Shaw|Grégoire Aslan|Kurt Christian|Takis Emmanuel|David Garfield|Aldo Sambrell|Ferdinando Poggi|Robert Rietty|Robert Shaw
keywords: treasure chest|gold coin|psychotronic film|reference to kali the hindu deity|sinbad the sailor character
title: El viaje fantástico de Simbad
